---
description: >-
  Polygon API - Returns all transaction receipts for the given block number or
  hash
---

# eth\_getTransactionReceiptsByBlock

## Parameters

`block_number` in hex OR `block_hash`

## Returns

Array of transaction receipt objects

## Example

### [Alchemy Composer](https://composer.alchemyapi.io/?composer\_state=%7B%22chain%22%3A0%2C%22network%22%3A0%2C%22methodName%22%3A%22eth\_getTransactionReceipt%22%2C%22paramValues%22%3A%5B%22%22%5D%7D)

The Alchemy Composer allows you to make a no-code example request via your browser. Try it out above!

### Request

{% tabs %}
{% tab title="Curl" %}
```bash
curl https://polygon-mainnet.g.alchemyapi.io/v2/your-api-key \
-X POST \
-H "Content-Type: application/json" \
-d '{"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"eth_getTransactionReceiptsByBlock","params":["0x989689"], "id":1}'
```
{% endtab %}

{% tab title="Postman" %}
```http
URL: https://polygon-mainnet.g.alchemyapi.io/v2/your-api-key
RequestType: POST
Body: 
{
    "jsonrpc":"2.0",
    "method":"eth_getTransactionReceiptsByBlock",
    "params":["0x989689"], 
    "id":1
}
```
{% endtab %}
{% endtabs %}

##
